trans-unit.source: UPDATE January, 2017:

trans-unit.source: Update 30 April 2014: This tree traversal needs to be rerun whenever a new element is added to the tree, but it seems from a comment by @Han that it is possible to avoid this by adding a mousedown event handler that sets unselectable on the target of the event. See http://jsbin.com/yagekiji/1 for details.
trans-unit.target: 2014年4月30日更新 ：每当将新元素添加到树中时，都需要重新运行此树遍历，但是从@Han的评论看来，可以通过添加在目标上设置为不可选的 mousedown 事件处理程序来避免这种情况事件的 有关详细信息，请参见http://jsbin.com/yagekiji/1 。

trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer的JavaScript解决方案是：

trans-unit.source: According to Can I use, the user-select is currently supported in all browsers except Internet Explorer 9 and earlier versions (but sadly still needs a vendor prefix).

trans-unit.source: As CSS-Tricks says, the problem is:
trans-unit.target: 正如CSS-Tricks所说， 问题是：

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we were unable to select the numbers, but we were able to copy them.
trans-unit.target: 正如大家看到的那样,我们无法选号,但我们可以复制。

trans-unit.source: Aside from the Mozilla-only property, no, there is no way to disable text selection with just standard CSS (as of now).
trans-unit.target: 除了Mozilla-only属性之外,没有,只用标准的CSS就无法禁止文本选择(从现在开始)。

trans-unit.source: CSS:
trans-unit.target: CSS:

trans-unit.source: Caveat: Internet Explorer 9 may not need this extra jQuery piece, so you may want to add a version check in there.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Internet Explorer 9可能不需要这个额外的jQuery，因此您可能需要在其中添加版本检查。

trans-unit.source: Check my solution without JavaScript:
trans-unit.target: 检查我的解决方案,没有JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Despite it is being implemented in browsers, you can make an illusion of text not being selected by using the same color and background color on selection as of the tab design (in your case).
trans-unit.target: 尽管它是在浏览器中实现的,但你可以通过在选择时使用与选项卡设计(在你的情况下)相同的颜色和背景色来制造文字没有被选中的假象。

trans-unit.source: Disallowing users to select the text will raise usability issues.
trans-unit.target: 不允许用户选择文字,会产生可用性问题。

trans-unit.source: Expand snippet
trans-unit.target: 扩展片段

trans-unit.source: For Internet Explorer < 10 and Opera < 15, you will need to use the unselectable attribute of the element you wish to be unselectable. You can set this using an attribute in HTML:
trans-unit.target: 对于Internet Explorer <10和Opera <15，您将需要使用希望不可选择的元素的 unselectable 属性。 您可以使用HTML中的属性进行设置：

trans-unit.source: For Internet Explorer in addition, you need to add pseudo class focus (.ClassName:focus) and outline-style: none.
trans-unit.target: 此外，对于Internet Explorer，您需要添加伪类 focus （.ClassName：focus）和 outline-style: none 。

trans-unit.source: For anchors that act like buttons (for example, Questions, Tags, Users, etc. at the top of the Stack Overflow page) or tabs, is there a CSS standard way to disable the highlighting effect if the user accidentally selects the text?
trans-unit.target: 对于充当按钮的锚（例如，“堆栈溢出”页面顶部的“ 问题” ，“ 标签” ，“ 用户 ”等）或选项卡，是否存在CSS标准方法来禁用突出显示效果（如果用户不小心选择了文本）？

trans-unit.source: For those who have trouble achieving the same in the Android browser with the touch event, use:
trans-unit.target: 对于那些在安卓浏览器中难以实现同样的触控事件的用户,使用。

trans-unit.source: How to disable text selection highlighting
trans-unit.target: 如何禁用文本选择高亮显示

trans-unit.source: I figure you still want any input elements to be interactable, hence the :not() pseudo-selector. You could use '*' instead if you don't care.
trans-unit.target: 我认为您仍然希望任何输入元素都是可交互的，因此 :not() 伪选择器。 如果您不在乎，则可以使用 '*' 代替。

trans-unit.source: I found it in a CardFlip example.
trans-unit.target: 我是在一个CardFlip的例子中发现的。

trans-unit.source: I like the hybrid CSS + jQuery solution.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢CSS+jQuery的混合解决方案。

trans-unit.source: I realize this could be done with JavaScript, and a little googling yielded the Mozilla-only -moz-user-select option.
trans-unit.target: 我意识到这可以使用JavaScript来完成，并且经过少许搜索就产生了仅Mozilla的 -moz-user-select 选项。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Less and Bootstrap you could write:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Less and Bootstrap ，则可以编写：

trans-unit.source: If you notice, Stack Overflow doesn't disable text selection for their navigation buttons, and I would recommend against doing so in most cases, since it modifies normal selection behavior and makes it conflict with a user's expectations.
trans-unit.target: 如果你注意到了,Stack Overflow并没有禁用导航按钮的文本选择,我建议在大多数情况下不要这样做,因为这样做会修改正常的选择行为,并使其与用户的期望值发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: If you use the value none for all the CSS user-select properties (including browser prefixes of it), there is a problem which can be still occurred by this.
trans-unit.target: 如果对所有CSS user-select 属性（包括它的浏览器前缀）使用值 none ，则可能会出现此问题。

trans-unit.source: If you want to disable text selection on everything except on <p> elements, you can do this in CSS (watch out for the -moz-none which allows override in sub-elements, which is allowed in other browsers with none):
trans-unit.target: 如果要禁用除 <p> 元素以外的所有内容的文本选择，则可以在CSS中执行此操作（请注意 -moz-none ，它允许在子元素中进行覆盖，而在其他浏览器中则不允许使用它们覆盖）：

trans-unit.source: In an HTML tag:
trans-unit.target: 在一个HTML标签中。

trans-unit.source: In most browsers, this can be achieved using proprietary variations on the CSS user-select property, originally proposed and then abandoned in CSS 3 and now proposed in CSS UI Level 4:
trans-unit.target: 在大多数浏览器中，可以使用CSS user-select 属性的专有变体来实现此目的，该属性最初是在CSS 3中提出，然后在CSS 3中放弃 ，现在在CSS UI Level 4中提出的：

trans-unit.source: In the solutions in previous answers selection is stopped, but the user still thinks you can select text because the cursor still changes. To keep it static, you'll have to set your CSS cursor:
trans-unit.target: 在前面的答案中的解决方案中选择停止了,但用户仍然认为可以选择文字,因为光标仍然在变化。要想让它保持不变,你必须设置你的CSS光标。

trans-unit.source: Is there a standard-compliant way to accomplish this with CSS, and if not, what is the "best practice" approach?
trans-unit.target: 有没有一个符合标准的方法来实现CSS,如果没有,"最佳实践 "的方法是什么?

trans-unit.source: It is easily done with:
trans-unit.target: 它很容易做到与。

trans-unit.source: It's being discussed in How ::selection works on nested elements.
trans-unit.target: :: selection如何在嵌套元素上进行讨论。

trans-unit.source: It's not the best way, though.
trans-unit.target: 这不是最好的办法,不过。

trans-unit.source: Let's say you have a <h1 id="example">Hello, World!</h1>. You will have to remove the innerHTML of that h1, in this case Hello, World. Then you will have to go to CSS and do this:
trans-unit.target: 假设您有 <h1 id="example">Hello, World!</h1> 。 您将必须删除该 h1 的innerHTML，在本例中为Hello，World 。 然后，您将必须使用CSS并执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: More information can be found in Mozilla Developer Network documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Mozilla开发人员网络文档中找到更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Normal CSS Design
trans-unit.target: 一般的CSS设计

trans-unit.source: Note that it's a non-standard feature (i.e. not a part of any specification). It is not guaranteed to work everywhere, and there might be differences in implementation among browsers and in the future browsers can drop support for it.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这是非标准功能 （即不是任何规范的一部分）。 不能保证它在任何地方都能工作，并且浏览器的实现可能会有所不同，将来浏览器可能会放弃对此的支持。

trans-unit.source: Now it simply thinks it is a block-element, and not text.
trans-unit.target: 现在,它只是认为自己是块状元素,而不是文字。

trans-unit.source: On selection
trans-unit.target: 关于选择

trans-unit.source: Popup menu with my technique applied: http://jsfiddle.net/y4Lac/2/
trans-unit.target: 应用了我的技术的弹出菜单： http : //jsfiddle.net/y4Lac/2/

trans-unit.source: Prefix need to be used to support it in all browsers. Without a prefix this may not work in all the answers.
trans-unit.target: 前缀需要在所有浏览器中使用,以支持它。如果没有前缀,这可能无法在所有的答案中工作。

trans-unit.source: Sadly this property isn't inherited, meaning you have to put an attribute in the start tag of every element inside the <div>. If this is a problem, you could instead use JavaScript to do this recursively for an element's descendants:
trans-unit.target: 遗憾的是，该属性没有被继承，这意味着您必须在 <div> 内每个元素的开始标记中放置一个属性。 如果这是一个问题，您可以改为使用JavaScript为元素的后代递归执行此操作：

trans-unit.source: Set cursor to default so that it will give a unselectable feel to the user.
trans-unit.target: 将光标设置为默认值,这样会给用户一种不可选择的感觉。

trans-unit.source: Simply add your desired elements/ids in front of the selectors separated by commas without spaces, like so:
trans-unit.target: 只需在选择器前面添加你想要的元素ID,用逗号隔开,没有空格,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: Suppose there are two divs like this:
trans-unit.target: 假设有两个这样的 div ：

trans-unit.source: Tested on: Ubuntu, Google Chrome 38.0.2125.111.
trans-unit.target: 测试于： Ubuntu ， Google Chrome 38.0.2125.111。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript way is supported in older browsers, like old versions of Internet Explorer as well, but if it's not your case, use the CSS way then:
trans-unit.target: 较旧的浏览器（如旧版本的Internet Explorer）也支持JavaScript方式，但是如果您的情况并非如此，请使用CSS方式：

trans-unit.source: The correct answer is correct in that it prevents you from being able to select the text. However, it does not prevent you from being able to copy the text, as I'll show with the next couple of screenshots (as of 7th Nov 2014).
trans-unit.target: 正确答案是正确的,它阻止了你无法选择文字。但是,它并不妨碍你无法复制文字,下面我用下面的几张截图来说明(截至2014年11月7日)。

trans-unit.source: The only place I could see this being useful is if you have buttons for forms that should not be copy and pasted if a user copy and pasted the website.
trans-unit.target: 我唯一能看到这个有用的地方是,如果你有表单的按钮,如果用户复制和粘贴网站,不应该被复制和粘贴。

trans-unit.source: The other answers are better; this should probably be seen as a last resort/catchall.
trans-unit.target: 其他的答案比较好;这大概应该看成是最后的补救措施。

trans-unit.source: The real question is, why do you want users to not be able to highlight and presumably copy and paste certain elements? I have not come across a single time that I wanted to not let users highlight a certain portion of my website. Several of my friends, after spending many hours reading and writing code will use the highlight feature as a way to remember where on the page they were, or providing a marker so that their eyes know where to look next.
trans-unit.target: 真正的问题是,为什么要让用户不能高亮显示,并推测是复制粘贴某些元素?我没有遇到过一次想不让用户高亮显示网站的某一部分的情况。我的几个朋友,在花了很多时间阅读和编写代码后,都会使用高亮功能来记住他们在页面上的位置,或者提供一个标记,让他们的眼睛知道下一步该看哪里。

trans-unit.source: There is no "standards" compliant quick-and-easy way to do it; using JavaScript is an option.
trans-unit.target: 没有一个符合 "标准 "的快速、简单的方法,使用JavaScript是一种选择。

trans-unit.source: This is not CSS, but it is worth a mention:
trans-unit.target: 这不是CSS,但值得一提的是。

trans-unit.source: This of course is not supported in browsers that do not use the Gecko rendering engine.
trans-unit.target: 当然,这在不使用Gecko渲染引擎的浏览器中不支持。

trans-unit.source: This should work, but it won't work for the old browsers. There is a browser compatibility issue.
trans-unit.target: 这个应该能用,但对旧的浏览器就不行了。这里面有一个浏览器的兼容性问题。

trans-unit.source: This still doesn't cover all possibilities. While it is impossible to initiate selections in unselectable elements, in some browsers (Internet Explorer and Firefox, for example) it's still impossible to prevent selections that start before and end after the unselectable element without making the whole document unselectable.
trans-unit.target: 这仍然不能涵盖所有可能性。 尽管无法在不可选择的元素中启动选择，但是在某些浏览器（例如Internet Explorer和Firefox）中，仍然无法防止在不可选择的元素之前和之后开始的选择而不会使整个文档不可选择。

trans-unit.source: This will be useful if color selection is also not needed:
trans-unit.target: 如果也不需要选色的话,这样做会很有用。

trans-unit.source: This will make your text totally flat, like it would be in a desktop application.
trans-unit.target: 这将使你的文本完全平坦,就像在桌面应用程序中一样。

trans-unit.source: This works in some browsers:
trans-unit.target: 在某些浏览器中可以使用：

trans-unit.source: Though this pseudo-element was in drafts of CSS Selectors Level 3, it was removed during the Candidate Recommendation phase, as it appeared that its behavior was under-specified, especially with nested elements, and interoperability wasn't achieved.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个伪元素在CSS Selectors Level 3的草案中出现过,但在候选推荐阶段就被删除了,因为它的行为似乎没有得到充分的规范,特别是在嵌套元素的情况下,没有实现互操作性。

trans-unit.source: To get the result I needed, I found I had to use both ::selection and user-select
trans-unit.target: 为了获得所需的结果，我发现必须同时使用 ::selection 和 user-select

trans-unit.source: To make all elements inside <div class="draggable"></div> unselectable, use this CSS:
trans-unit.target: 要使 <div class="draggable"></div> 内的所有元素均不可选择，请使用以下CSS：

trans-unit.source: Try to insert these rows into the CSS and call the "disHighlight" at class property:
trans-unit.target: 尝试将这些行插入到CSS中,并在类属性处调用 "disHighlight"。

trans-unit.source: Until CSS 3's user-select property becomes available, Gecko-based browsers support the -moz-user-select property you already found. WebKit and Blink-based browsers support the -webkit-user-select property.
trans-unit.target: 在CSS 3的user-select属性可用之前，基于Gecko的浏览器将支持您已经找到的 -moz-user-select 属性。 基于WebKit和基于Blink的浏览器支持 -webkit-user-select 属性。

trans-unit.source: With SASS (SCSS syntax)
trans-unit.target: 使用SASS （SCSS语法）

trans-unit.source: Workaround for WebKit:
trans-unit.target: WebKit的解决方法：

trans-unit.source: You can also use the below one to enforce that an entire element gets selected which means if you click on an element, all the text wrapped in that element will get selected. For this all you have to do is changing the value none to all.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用下面的选项来 enforce 选择整个元素，这意味着如果单击某个元素，则包装在该元素中的所有文本都将被选择。 为此，您要做的就是将值 none 更改为 all 。

trans-unit.source: You can do so in Firefox and Safari (Chrome also?)
trans-unit.target: 你可以在Firefox和Safari中这样做(Chrome浏览器也是如此?

trans-unit.source: You can do this with a mixin:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用mixin做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: You can use CSS or JavaScript for that.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为此使用CSS或JavaScript 。
